list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the coldest season of the year, in the northern hemisphere from December to February and in the southern hemisphere from June to August.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the tree has a good crop of berries in winter
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cây có một loại quả mọng tốt trong mùa đông

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of fruit and vegetables) ripening late in the growing season and suitable for storage over the winter.
(especially of a bird) spend the winter in a particular place.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chim mùa đông ở vùng biển Caribbean
